Name: Wetpants
About the game: Wetpants is all about keeping your fortress clear of evil critters...in Virtual Reality. You have at your disposal an arsenal of weapons to get the job done. In your endeavour to safeguard your flag from evil cows, you will shoot arrows, throw bombs, and rely on your trusty companions to get you through each wave of assailants. This experience requires the HTC Vive headset.
